answers.answer: "Can I still take my daily multi-vitamins"Yes"I heard that taking omega-6 supplements are good"Yes they are. So is omega-3"other supplements that I can take that's safe"Supplements are unregulated. Discuss with your doctor before taking supplements. There's a lot of junk out there.

question: Can I still take my daily multi-vitamins. Also, I heard that taking omega-6 supplements are good. Are there any other supplements that I can take that's safe while on insulin/pill diabetes medication?
title: Safe Vitamin Supplements for Diabetes Type 2
